resources.string: There was an issue with this application: %1$s
Logs have been copied to the clipboard
You are not connected to the Internet.
Task with the same name exists
Create a new task by clicking on \"New task\" or import tasks by using \"From file\". Please be aware that as for now, if you import a file, your current tasks will get deleted.
This task is labeled as finished by %1$s (%2$s).
Task undone: Member does not exist
You have finished %1$d of %2$d of your exercises
This can\'t be used as it seems like there are no tasks
This can\'t be used as it seems like there is no user selected
Label task as voluntary/without a set member
To manage subtasks (f.e. delete them or add extra information), you have to visit the task\'s page. You can get there by clicking on the task.
Create a new member by clicking on \"New member\" or import members by using \"From file\". Please be aware that as for now, if you import a file, your current members will get deleted.
Rule must have a title and a rule
Create a new rule by clicking on \"New rule\" or import rules by using \"From file\". Please be aware that as for now, if you import a file, your current rules will get deleted.
…to Home Harmony. An application for you to order the household.\n\nQuick info: Down below, you can find informations about the app\'s permissions and how I use them.
View network connections & and have full network access>

In order to only check for Updates, when connected to WiFi, the App needs to view network connections. It only checks, what kind of connection is used. The application needs to have full network access to get the update file from GitHub-Release.
In order to install the app update, the application needs the permission to install apps from unknown sources.
In order to guarantee the functionality of the application, you can only edit the user\'s prename
Please enter the nickname of the member, who finished this task.
This app-version is not a full release. This is a beta version so it could be unstable and things can lead this app to crash. Report issues if possible. Thank you for testing this application!
Tasks, you need to finish today
Please select a user in Settings first, to use this feature.
